template.name: All interacting genes in organism1_Orthologues in organism2
template.title: All gene interactions in organism1-->Orthologues in organism2

query.name: All interacting genes in organism1_Orthologues in organism2
query.view: Interaction.details.type Interaction.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Interaction.gene1.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.symbol Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.symbol Interaction.gene1.homologues.homologue.organism.name Interaction.gene2.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Interaction.gene2.homologues.homologue.symbol Interaction.gene2.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show all interactions from a specified organism and the orthologues of these genes in another organism. Optionally constrain the type of interaction to physical (protein-protein) or genetic interactions.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId

query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications_1
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId

query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications_1_1
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId

template.name: Chromosomal location _All genes Transcripts Exons
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes + Transcripts + Exons.

query.name: Chromosomal location _All genes Transcripts Exons
query.view: Chromosome.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.start Chromosome.locatedFeatures.end Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.transcripts.gene.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a specified organism and chromosomal location show all genes, transcripts and exons.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Chromosome location_genes
query.view: Chromosome.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.primaryIdentifier Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.symbol Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.start Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.end Chromosome.locatedFeatures.feature.chromosomeLocation.strand Chromosome.locatedFeatures.start
query.longDescription: Show the genes located between two points on a chromosome.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: Chromosome_All genes.
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: GO Ontology Annotation
query.view: GOTerm.name GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.qualifier GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.subject.name GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.subject.primaryIdentifier GOTerm.identifier
query.longDescription: Expand the ontology annotation on the report page

template.name: GO term identifier _ GO term name.
template.title: GO term identifier --> GO term name.

query.name: GO term identifier _ GO term name.
query.view: GOTerm.description GOTerm.identifier GOTerm.name
query.longDescription: Give the GO term name for a particular GO term identifier.

template.name: GO term name _ GO term identifier.
template.title: GO term name --> GO term identifier.

query.name: GO term name _ GO term identifier.
query.view: GOTerm.description GOTerm.identifier GOTerm.name
query.longDescription: Find the GO identifier for a specific term.

query.name: GO term_Genes.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show genes annotated with a specified GO term. Optionally constrain the organism and the evidence code. (Includes 'with' annotation: the 'with' field holds an additional identifier for annotations using certain evidence codes)

query.name: GO term_Interacting gene_Genes.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.gene2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol
query.longDescription: List all genes that are annotated with a given GO term and that have been shown to interact with a specific gene.

template.name: GO_Ontology_Annotation
template.title: Genes annotated with this GO term

query.name: GO_Ontology_Annotation
query.view: GOTerm.name GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.qualifier GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.subject.name GOTerm.ontologyAnnotations.subject.primaryIdentifier GOTerm.identifier
query.longDescription: List genes annotated with this GO term in place of ontology annotations table.

template.name: Gene _ GO term name _ Gene with the GO term name.
template.title: Gene + GO term name--> Gene with the GO term name.

query.name: Gene _ GO term name _ Gene with the GO term name.
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier
query.longDescription: Show if the following gene has the following GO term.

query.name: Gene template to summary
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.source Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Enter different types of gene IDs and get a summary

query.name: Gene_Chromosomal location.
query.view: Gene.name Gene.symbol Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.locations.start Gene.locations.end Gene.locations.strand
query.longDescription: how the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_Exons
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.exons.length Gene.transcripts.exons.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.feature.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.transcripts.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.transcripts.organism.name
query.longDescription: For a specific gene, show its exons with their chromosomal locations and lengths. To show exons for all genes, turn off the constraint on the gene name.

template.name: Gene_GO terms and parents of those terms.
template.title: Gene -->GO terms and parents of those terms.

query.name: Gene_GO terms and parents of those terms.
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name
query.longDescription: Given a gene show the associated GO terms, and all parents to the top of the directed graph. The query returns a column containing the assigned GO term and a column containing all parents of that primary assignment

query.name: Gene_GO terms.
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene

query.name: Gene_Interacting Genes Orthologues
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.relationshipType.name Gene.interactions.gene2.symbol Gene.interactions.gene2.homologues.homologue.symbol
query.longDescription: For a particular gene show it's interacting genes and their orthologues (Note = orthologues of the interacting genes).

query.name: Gene_Orthologs_GO Terms
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.type Gene.organism.name Gene.homologues.gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.ontologyAnnotations.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code
query.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to orthologues of a specific gene.

query.name: Gene_Orthologues
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.dataSets.name Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name
query.longDescription: For a given Gene (or List of Genes) get all the orthologues specific to an organism.

query.name: Gene_Orthologues_GO Terms
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.type Gene.organism.name Gene.homologues.gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.shortName Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.ontologyAnnotations.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code
query.longDescription: Show GO terms applied to orthologues of a specific gene.

query.name: Gene_Orthologues_Sequence
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.evidence.evidenceCode.name Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.sequence.residues Gene.homologues.homologue.sequence.length
query.longDescription: For a given Gene (or List of Genes) returns the orthologues and the sequence of the gene(s)

query.name: Gene_Overlapping QTLs
query.view: Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.type Gene.overlappingFeatures.trait Gene.overlappingFeatures.geneIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.pValue

query.name: Gene_Overlapping QTLs TEST
query.view: Gene.overlappingFeatures.name Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.type

query.name: Gene_Pathway
query.view: Pathway.identifier Pathway.name Pathway.dataSets.name Pathway.proteins.genes.symbol Pathway.proteins.genes.secondaryIdentifier
